paper_abstract: In this note, we give a proof that several vertex ordering problems can be solved in O (au)(2 (n) ) time and O (au)(2 (n) ) space, or in O (au)(4 (n) ) time and polynomial space. The algorithms generalize algorithms for the Travelling Salesman Problem by Held and Karp (J. Soc. Ind. Appl. Math. 10:196-210, 1962) and Gurevich and Shelah (SIAM J. Comput. 16:486-502, 1987). We survey a number of vertex ordering problems to which the results apply.
paper_title: A Note on Exact Algorithms for Vertex Ordering Problems on Graphs
